definitions.explanation_en: A surname of Scottish origin, historically associated with families in the Borders region; used as a proper noun to identify individuals or lineages bearing this name.
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自苏格兰的姓氏，历史上与边境地区的一些家族相关；作为专有名词，用于指代拥有此姓氏的个人或家族。
definitions.example_en: The Turnbuls have lived in the Scottish Highlands for over 300 years.
definitions.example_cn: 特纳布尔家族已在苏格兰高地生活了300多年。

definitions.explanation_en: A proper name used in modern contexts, notably associated with public figures such as professional wrestlers or athletes, where the name has become culturally recognized.
definitions.explanation_cn: 在现代语境中作为专有名称使用，尤其因职业摔跤手或运动员等公众人物而广为人知，该姓氏已具有文化辨识度。
definitions.example_en: The Turnbuckle brothers were famous professional wrestlers known for their high-flying moves.
definitions.example_cn: 特纳布尔兄弟是著名的职业摔跤手，以高飞动作闻名。

comparison.analysis: “Surname”（姓氏）是通用术语，泛指任何家族姓氏，而 “Turnbull” 是一个具体的姓氏实例。前者是类别，后者是成员。
“Name”（名字）是更宽泛的词，可指全名、教名或姓氏；而 “Turnbull” 仅指姓氏部分，不具备独立语义，必须作为专有名词使用。
“Family name”（家族名）与 “Turnbull” 在功能上等同，但前者是描述性术语，后者是具体承载历史与文化身份的专有名称。
